Education

    B.A in Mathematics and Computer Science. Honors Degree.

    High School.

Research

  • Summer 2023
    REU-CAAR (Combinatorics, Algorithms, and AI for Real Problems)
    Researcher at University of Maryland, College Park (Fairness in Diffusion Models)
    • Worked on improving fairness and general representation (of gender and race characteristics) in text-to-image generative AI models.
    • Applied "Semantic Guidance" approach to modify gender and race embeddings by guiding the concepts in embedding space, yielding more representative gender and race output.}
  • Summer 2022
    Swarthmore College
    Math Researcher (Circle Packings from Tilings of the Plane)
    • Analyzed properties of five limit circle packings from tilings of the plane, including integrality/superintegrality and commensurability to known polyhedra. Found first known superintegral packing that is non-commensurable to any polyhedra.
    • Advised by Professor Ian Whitehead at Swarthmore College and paper submitted to Journal of Geometry.
  • Summer 2021
    Swarthmore College
    Math Researcher (Exploring Projective SET)
    • Used Linear and Abstract Algebra to classify and discover the properties of the algebraic space of projective SET. Calculated the number of projective sets of a certain size and the probability a set is achieved in a deal of cards using the Orbit-Stabilizer Theorem and counting techniques.
    • Advised by Professor Lucas Van Meter and Professor Cathy Hsu at Swarthmore College.
